The baby climbed up the side of the captains chair and onto KitKats
shoulder. It bit down using KitKats internal circuitry as an antenna it sent
a message.

In her mind Phobia appeared. His voice echoing thouroughly. "In the event of
my deletion I send this message." The voice was calm and collected with an
honest tone about it."I came to this planet planning to save our time. Since
you're hearing this something drastic must have happened to me." It paused
again trying to collect himself. "Temporal waves from this planet cause
great destruction throughout the universe, it must be stopped or we will
create the biggest Paradox in cybertrons history." with that the message
stopped and the spider fell off and died.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 23, 2000 6:31 AM
Subject: Re: Wierd Events


> ::KitKat::
>
> She got up and went to the mess hall.  She got a hot cup of Cybertron
> tea and went back to the bridge.  She sat back down in the captian's
> chair and watches the external monitors.  She thought about the new
> Predacon council and how things might work out for her troops.  She
> wanted them to make it through the war and find some peace in the
> crazy world.  She thought about what would happen if she and Drillbit
> finally had the chance to settle down. She chuckled quietly to
> herself at the thought of offspring.  She shook her head and checked
> the monitors again.  She sighed and sat back in the chair.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > The remaining babies woke up moving slowly around taking internal
> inventory.
> > One reached a vent on the bridge. it crawled out and started moving
> towards
> > KitKat.
>
>
>
>
>
